thread.title: Blues fest planned at First Christian Church
thread.title_full: Blues fest planned at First Christian Church

title: Blues fest planned at First Christian Church
text: Print this article Advertisement The First Christian Church, 518 S. Main St., Milton-Freewater, will be hosting a Blues Festival at 7 p.m. on Saturday. Regional area blues musicians will provide an evening of music followed by refreshments and fellowship. The event is open to the public. A free will offering will be taken. For more information contact the church at 541-938-3854. Office hours are Monday through Thursday from 8 a.m. until noon. More like this story
